description: Try our easy to follow Peach, Zucchini And Garden Pea Salad  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Peach, Zucchini And Garden Pea Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch the mixed peas in a saucepan of rapidly-boiling salted water for 30 seconds, then refresh in iced water. Drain thoroughly.

Slice the zucchini lengthways into fine strips. Use a small sharp knife to cut the peaches into fine wedges. Toss with the mixed peas, almond, radishes and tarragon, then arrange on a platter. Mix the vinegar, horseradish and remaining olive oil, then season with salt and pepper.
Drizzle the dressing over. Serving Suggestion
